resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106551</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106551</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207188</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Fort Raleigh National Historic Site Children's Page</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fort Raleigh Der Nationalen Historischen Seite 
Site-Kinder</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Page des Enfants Historiques Nationaux de Site 
De Raleigh de Fort</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Das Crianças Historic Nacionais Do Local De 
Raleigh Do Fort Página</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pagina Forte Dei Bambini Storici Nazionali 
Del Luogo Di Raleigh</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σελίδα των εθνικών ιστορικών παιδιών περιοχών 
Raleigh οχυρών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Paginación De los Niños Históricos Nacionales 
Del Sitio De Raleigh De la Fortaleza</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">features stories about England's first attempt to establish a colony in America (The Roanoke Voyages: A Mystery Story for Young People) and a site that became home to thousands of freed slaves during the Civil War (Freedom Comes to Roanoke Island).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Merkmale Geschichten über Englands versuchen 
zuerst, eine Kolonie in Amerika herzustellen (das Roanoke Voyages: 
Eine Geheimnis-Geschichte für junge Leute) und eine Site, die 
zu den Tausenden der freigegebenen Sklaven während des Bürgerkrieges
Haupt wurden (Freiheit, kommt zur Roanoke Insel).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les histoires de dispositifs au sujet de 
l'Angleterre essayent d'abord d'établir une colonie en Amérique (le 
Roanoke voyage : Une histoire de mystère pour des jeunes) et un
site qui sont devenus à la maison aux milliers d'esclaves libérés 
pendant la guerre civile (liberté vient à l'île de Roanoke).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">as histórias das características sobre 
Inglaterra tentam primeiramente estabelecer uma colônia em América 
(o Roanoke viaja: Uma história do mistério para os povos 
novos) e um local que se tornaram home aos milhares de escravos 
livrados durante a guerra civil (liberdade vem ao console de Roanoke).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">le storia delle caratteristiche circa 
l'Inghilterra in primo luogo tentano di stabilire una colonia in 
America (il Roanoke voyages: Una storia di mistero per i 
giovani) e un luogo che sono diventato domestici ai migliaia degli 
schiavi liberati durante la guerra civile (libertà viene all'isola di
Roanoke).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χαρακτηρίζει τις ιστορίες για την πρώτη προσπάθεια της
Αγγλίας να καθιερώσει μια αποικία στην Αμερική (τα ταξίδια 
Roanoke: μια ιστορία μυστηρίου για τους νέους) και μια περιοχή 
που έγιναν κατ' οίκον σε χιλιάδες ελευθερωμένοι σκλάβοι κατά τη 
διάρκεια του εμφύλιου πολέμου (η ελευθερία έρχεται στο νησί 
Roanoke).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">las historias de las características sobre 
Inglaterra primero procuran establecer a una colonia en América (el 
Roanoke viaja: Una historia del misterio para la gente joven) y 
un sitio que hicieron caseros a los millares de esclavos liberados 
durante la guerra civil (libertad viene a la isla de Roanoke).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207188</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106551</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/fort-raleigh-national-historic-site-childrens-page</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
